DataElement.preferredName: Most Recent Last Contact Subtract First Pathologic Diagnosis Day Calculation Value
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Time interval from the date of the initial pathologic diagnosis to the date of the most recent last contact, represented as a calculated number of days.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Most Recent Last Contact Person Subtraction First Pathologic Diagnosis Time Duration
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Nearest to the present._Coming after all others in time or space or degree or being the only one remaining._A person acting as a channel for communication between groups or on behalf of a group._The act of removing a part from the whole._Preceding all others in time or space or degree._Caused by or altered by or manifesting disease or pathology._The investigation, analysis and recognition of the presence and nature of disease, condition, or injury from expressed signs and symptoms; also, the scientific determination of any kind; the concise results of such an investigation._The continuum of experience in which events pass from the future through the present to the past._The period of time during which something continues.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Most Recent Last Contact Person Subtraction First Pathologic Diagnosis Time
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Nearest to the present.:Coming after all others in time or space or degree or being the only one remaining.:A person acting as a channel for communication between groups or on behalf of a group.:The act of removing a part from the whole.:Preceding all others in time or space or degree.:Caused by or altered by or manifesting disease or pathology.:The investigation, analysis and recognition of the presence and nature of disease, condition, or injury from expressed signs and symptoms; also, the scientific determination of any kind; the concise results of such an investigation.:the continuum of experience in which events pass from the future through the present to the past.

Concepts.definition: Coming after all others in time or space or degree or being the only one remaining.
A person acting as a channel for communication between groups or on behalf of a group.
The act of removing a part from the whole.
Preceding all others in time or space or degree.
Caused by or altered by or manifesting disease or pathology.

The investigation, analysis and recognition of the presence and nature of disease, condition, or injury from expressed signs and symptoms; also, the scientific determination of any kind; the concise results of such an investigation.
The continuum of experience in which events pass from the future through the present to the past.

Property.preferredDefinition: The period of time during which something continues.

Concepts.definition: The period of time during which something continues.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the process of identifying a disease by the signs and symptoms (NCI Glossary).

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Created for LUAD CDF per request by K.Wildermuth. mc 1/29/16

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours._The procedure or activity of determining something by mathematical or logical methods._A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours.:The procedure or activity of determining something by mathematical or logical methods.:A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.

Concepts.definition: The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours, equal to 86 400 seconds. This also refers to a specific day.
The procedure or activity of determining something by mathematical or logical methods.
A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: Calculation created for TCGA content requested by Dr. Ari Kahn.  This VD uses a calculation of dividing a value by the number of milliseconds in a day (86,400,000) to result in a number of days, stored as a whole number.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Number of Days from Date of I
ReferenceDocuments.description: Number of Days from Date of Initial Pathologic Diagnosis to the Date of Most Recent Date of Last Contact

DataElement.changeDescription: Created for LUAD CDF per request by K.Wildermuth. mc 1/29/16
